title: Ambassador Josette Sheeran: Founder and CEO of Firefly Global Group | McCain Institute

quotes: Ambassador Josette Sheeran is a decorated diplomat, humanitarian, entrepreneur and technology leader recognized by Forbes as the 30th most powerful woman in the world in 2011.
In 2012 she pioneered public blockchain to provide refugee support in war zones.

She headed the World Food Program, which was awarded the Nobel Peace Prize in 2020, leading the world's biggest humanitarian supply chains, with more than 18,000 staff delivering more than 20 billion meals a year to war and disaster zones.

organizations.name: Firefly Global Group
quotes: Ambassador Josette Sheeran: Founder and CEO of Firefly Global Group | McCain Institute
She serves as founder and CEO of Firefly Global Group, a geopolitical and business consulting firm, supporting founders and accelerating new technologies which enhance national and human security.

organizations.name: McCain Institute
quotes: Ambassador Josette Sheeran: Founder and CEO of Firefly Global Group | McCain Institute
She serves on the boards of the Business Council for International Understanding and the McCain Institute for International Leadership.

organizations.name: Capital Group funds
quotes: She serves on the boards of Capital Group funds, which manages more than $2.5 trillion in global investments;

organizations.name: Vestergaard International
quotes: She serves on the boards of... Vestergaard International, which has delivered 1 billion high-tech nets to prevent deaths from malaria;

organizations.name: Lifestraw
quotes: She serves on the boards of... Lifestraw, a pioneer in access to safe water;

organizations.name: Sceye
quotes: She serves on the boards of... Sceye, the world’s first stationary stratospheric vessel.

organizations.name: Canoo Technologies
quotes: She has served as President and Director of Canoo Technologies working with NASA and the U.S. Army.

organizations.name: World Food Program
quotes: She headed the World Food Program, which was awarded the Nobel Peace Prize in 2020, leading the world's biggest humanitarian supply chains, with more than 18,000 staff delivering more than 20 billion meals a year to war and disaster zones.

organizations.name: Business Council for International Understanding
quotes: She serves on the boards of the Business Council for International Understanding and the McCain Institute for International Leadership.

organizations.name: AGRA
quotes: Previously, Josette served as a founding board member of AGRA, launched with $10b in investment from Bill Gates and Warren Buffett;

organizations.name: World Economic Forum
quotes: Previously, Josette served as... Vice Chair of the World Economic Forum;

organizations.name: United Nations
quotes: UN Special Envoy, leading a successful effort to end a cholera epidemic in Haiti; Executive Director of the United Nations World Food Program;

organizations.name: US Overseas Investment Corporation (OPIC)
quotes: She has served on the boards of the US Overseas Investment Corporation (OPIC);

roles.title: Founder and CEO
quotes: Ambassador Josette Sheeran: Founder and CEO of Firefly Global Group | McCain Institute
She serves as founder and CEO of Firefly Global Group, a geopolitical and business consulting firm, supporting founders and accelerating new technologies which enhance national and human security.

roles.title: U.S. Ambassador
quotes: She has been twice unanimously confirmed as a U.S. Ambassador, including leading economic, energy, technology, agriculture and transportation negotiations for US Secretary of State Condoleezza Rice.

roles.title: President and Director
quotes: She has served as President and Director of Canoo Technologies working with NASA and the U.S. Army.

roles.title: Executive Director
quotes: Executive Director of the United Nations World Food Program;

roles.title: United States Undersecretary of State
quotes: United States Undersecretary of State;

roles.title: Deputy U.S. Trade Representative
quotes: Deputy U.S. Trade Representative and Ambassador covering 86 nations in Asia and Africa, and led U.S. global negotiations on finance, manufacturing, labor, environment, intellectual property, and trade capacity building.

roles.title: UN Special Envoy
quotes: UN Special Envoy, leading a successful effort to end a cholera epidemic in Haiti;

roles.title: Vice Chair
quotes: Vice Chair of the World Economic Forum;
